channel.title: Comments on: Open In Designer Tip

item.title: By: Stephen Hood
item.dc:creator: Stephen Hood
item.description: <p>Thanks for posting that. Maybe the thing I've missed the most as well. <br /><br />Otherwise the client beta absolutely rocks for me. And that's using the 7 mail template and a 7 server right now. Can't wait until it's ready and Domino 8 can be put in place.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for posting that. Maybe the thing I’ve missed the most as well.

Otherwise the client beta absolutely rocks for me. And that’s using the 7 mail template and a 7 server right now. Can’t wait until it’s ready and Domino 8 can be put in place.
